name: Juan Manuel Muñoz González
positionDescription:
I have 18 years of experience in the software industry.

I have worked for major companies such as Repsol, Vodafone, Línea Directa, Banco Santander, among others. In some of these projects, I have had the opportunity to design and lead front-end architecture from scratch, gaining significant experience in this area. Besides designing the architecture, technically leading various front-end teams, and establishing best practices for creating solid and scalable applications, I enjoy being involved in the application development as another developer, which allows me to stay updated with technological advancements.

I have advanced knowledge in back-end and UX, providing me with a comprehensive understanding of the technical needs of any application, enabling me to offer support in these areas.

In 2022, I led the architecture of Repsol's ARIA project, which was part of the Stock Control application and was awarded Best in Class at Expoquimia in 2023.

Currently, I am involved in the architecture of microsites, along with the creation of a custom component library. This new type of architecture allows us to create applications quickly, robustly, and independently, representing the future of web development.

experience.name: Front-End Architect
experience.description: Front-End Architect. Design of the architecture and tech leadership of the front-end team.

proyects.name: Webs 2.0
proyects.description: Applications for digital certificate management. Design of microsite-based architecture using a proprietary component library and leadership in development. Distribution of front-end team tasks, code reviews, and establishment of work methodologies.

experience.name: Front-end Architect
experience.description: Front-End Architect. Design and refactoring of architecture, technical leadership of the three front-end teams.

proyects.name: Signicat Products
proyects.description: Applications for digital certificate and facial recognition management. Design and refactoring of various identification products for Signicat. Training and code reviews for different front-end teams. Establishment of methodologies for achieving robust and scalable applications.

experience.name: Front-end Architect
experience.description: Front-end Architect / Consulting Manager. Architecture design and consulting.

proyects.name: Repsol Project Aria
proyects.description: Application that manages Repsol's Big Data. Design and development of the architecture for the Aria platform, software responsible for managing Repsol's Big Data. Awarded in 2023 as the best Big Data platform by Expoquimia. Leadership of the front-end teams.

proyects.name: Vodafone IDM
proyects.description: Software responsible for managing identities on the platform. Design and solutions for the IDM architecture at Vodafone.

proyects.name: Santander Iberia Plus
proyects.description: Application that manages offers and bonuses for Santander clients. Front-end architecture design and consulting.

experience.name: Front-End Senior

proyects.name: Games 2.0
proyects.description: Online and retail gambling video games. Development of gambling video games using web technology. Creation of new games and maintenance of existing ones. Enhancement of application performance through best development practices.
